data.title: The Whisky Exchange – Frighteningly Good Whiskies! — Malthound
data.text:
Supplier Brand Bottle

Size Price The Whisky Exchange

Aultmore 1983 / 14 Year Old / Cask Strength Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 14 Year Old Strength: 58.8%

Vintage: 1983 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 58.8% / Flora & Fauna – A limited edition 1984 vintage release of Aultmore. This was one of the small number of cask strength bottlings that were included in the Flora & Fauna range. 70cl £ 299.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenlivet 1972 / Cellar Collection Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 52.3%

Vintage: 1972 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 52.3% / Distillery Bottling – A 1972 vintage Glenlivet bottled in 2005 as part of their Cellar Collection series. One of the winners of the series, with 4.5 stars from Whisky Fun's Serge Valentin. 70cl £ 550.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Arran 10 Year Old Malt Miniature Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: 10 Year Old Strength: 46%

Summary: 5cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – A miniature bottle of 10 year old whisky from the Isle of Aran distillery, only distilling since 1995 and already producing a range of excellent drams. 5cl £ 3.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Balvenie 30 Year Old Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 30 Year Old Strength: 47.3%

Summary: 70cl / 47.3% / Distillery Bottling – A highly thought of 30 year old from Balvenie that netted a Gold Medal at the 2010 International Spirits Challenge and a 90 points from Serge Valentin on Whisky fun. 70cl £ 320.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Four Roses Small Batch Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey

Country: American Region: American

Age: Strength: 45%

Summary: 70cl / 45% – A terrific small batch bourbon from Four Roses – and in this case, Small Batch means just that – only four casks are used in the construction of each release. Sweet and spicy, with a generous dash of vanilla, this is a treat. 70cl £ 25.75 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Royal Salute Hundred Cask Selection Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – A very special edition of Royal Salute, assembled by Chivas Brothers using 100 casks aged to perfection following up to forty years of cask maturation. 70cl £ 165.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Whyte & Mackay 19 Year Old – Old Luxury Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: 19 Year Old Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – A matusalem sherry-matured blend – this will be weighty and rich: approach with suitable gravitas. On a side note, we are loving W&M's Mackintosh-esque rebrand, which seems to be bucking recent trends by actually making the product look better. 70cl £ 36.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Suntory Hakushu 18 Year Old Japanese Single Malt Whisky

Country: Japanese Region: Japanese

Age: 18 Year Old Strength: 43%

Summary: 70cl / 43% – A massive step up in quality from the standard Hakushu 12 yrs, this 18yo is amazingly well-defined (as we've come to expect from Japanese whisky) with deliciously rounded fruit and cereal flavours, at times surprisingly reminiscent of the finest Irish potstill whisky (eg Redbreast 15yo). 70cl £ 105.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Talisker 18 Year Old Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: 18 Year Old Strength: 45.8%

Summary: 70cl / 45.8% / Distillery Bottling – One of our all-time favourite malts, Talisker 18 years old is a masterpiece from one of Scotland's greatest distilleries, and was named 'Best Single Malt Whisky in the World' at the World Whiskies Awards in 2007. Stunning balance of peat, spice and sweetness. 70cl £ 64.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glen Garioch 21 Year Old Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: 21 Year Old Strength: 43%

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Distillery Bottling 70cl £ 199.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Locke's 8 Year Old Irish Single Malt Whiskey

Country: Irish Region: Irish

Age: 8 Year Old Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – "A very tasty dram, with a clear malt-intense in the Speyside style. The sheer intensity of the malt is sublime." Jim Murray, author of Classic Irish Whiskey. 70cl £ 31.25 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Highland Park 25 Year Old Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: 25 Year Old Strength: 48.1%

Summary: 70cl / 48.1% / Distillery Bottling – Highland Park 25yo is a terrifically complex, rich, woody, sherried dram. It seems as if this release will be the last at cask strength as the company is running low on stocks, so don't tarry too long if you want one of these. 70cl £ 133.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Highland Park 21 Year Old Miniature Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: 21 Year Old Strength: 47.5%

Summary: 5cl / 47.5% / Distillery Bottling – A miniature of the no-longer-extinct 47.5% version of Highland Park 21yo. 5cl £ 9.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Royal Salute 21 Year Old / Green Wade Decanter Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: 21 Year Old Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – One of the jewels in the Chivas crown, Royal Salute is a very special long-aged blend in a classic Wade ceramic decanter. Please note that this is the *green* decanter. 70cl £ 88.49 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

St. George's Distillery Chapter 9/ Peated/ English Whisky Co English Whisky

Country: English Region: English

Age: Strength: 46%

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – This small batch peated Chapter 9 from the English Whisky Co.'s St. George Distillery has been aged in first-fill ex-bourbon casks for over three years, so it qualifies to be known as English Single Malt whisky. We reckon it'll be popular. 70cl £ 37.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Robbie Burns / Gold Label / Bot. 1970s Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1970 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 43% – A 1970s bottling of Robbie Burns 'Famed' blended Scotch whisky, produced by R.H. Thomson & Co of Edinburgh, one of the subsidiaries of the Distillers Company at the time and thus one of the precursors of Diageo. 75cl £ 99.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glendullan 18 Year Old / Manager's Dram / Sherry Cask Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 18 Year Old Strength: 64%

Summary: 75cl / 64% / Distillery Bottling – A richly coloured whisky from Glendullan, selected by the distillery manager and originally given as a present to the friends and employees of the distillery. This one went out into the world in November 1989 and only a few remain undrunk. 75cl £ 350.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Octomore 5 Year Old / Edition 03.152 Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 5 Year Old Strength: 59%

Summary: 70cl / 59% / Distillery Bottling – The third annual release of 'normal' Octomore has arrived – unlike the previous bottling, Orpheus, this has not been wine-finished and, at 152ppm, is said to be most heavily-peated Octomore released so far. 70cl £ 125.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Benrinnes 1968 / 19 Year Old Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 19 Year Old Strength: 57.1%

Vintage: 1968 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 57.1% / Sestante – A very old Sestante bottling of Benrinnes 1968, bottled at 100 UK proof in the late 1980s. 75cl £ 399.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Black Bowmore 1964 / 42 Year Old / Sherry Cask Islay Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 42 Year Old Strength: 40.5%

Vintage: 1964 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 40.5% / Distillery Bottling – Well, here it is – just over twelve years after the previous release, a legend is reborn: Black Bowmore is back! Selected from the same batch of Oloroso casks as the previous bottlings, this is a must-have for wealthy Islayphiles. 75cl £ 3,999.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glendronach 1971 / Oloroso Sherry Butt #441 / Japan Speyside Whisky

Country: Japanese Region: Japanese

Age: Strength: 48.1%

Vintage: 1971 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 48.1% / Distillery Bottling – A special single-cask Glendronach 1971 bottled for the Japanese market, Cask 441 is an Oloroso Sherry butt bottled in September 201 at the grand old age of 39 years old. As before we have very limited stock of these, so it must be MAXIMUM 1 BOTTLE PER CUSTOMER. 70cl £ 415.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Knockando 1995 / 15 Year Old Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 15 Year Old Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1995 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Distillery Bottling – Continuing Knockando's habit of marking the vintage of their whiskies, this 15 year old was distilled in 1995 and aged in a mixture of sherry and bourbon casks. 70cl £ 44.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glendronach 1971 / 40 Year Old / Px Puncheon #1436 Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 40 Year Old Strength: 48.5%

Vintage: 1971 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 48.5% / Distillery Bottling – The oldest whisky in Glendronach's 4th release of single cask whiskies, this was distilled in 1971 and matured for 40 years in a PX puncheon to produce a spicy, dark and fruity dram. MAXIMUM 1 BOTTLE PER CUSTOMER. 70cl £ 425.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Br2 – Elements Of Islay Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 49.3%

Summary: 50cl / 49.3% / Speciality Drinks Ltd – The second release from this distillery in the Elements of Islay range, Br2 carries on from the regular characteristics of the distillery with a fruity and honeyed dram. 50cl £ 54.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Caperdonich 1972 / Connoisseurs Choice / Sherry Cask Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 46%

Vintage: 1972 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Gordon & Macphail – A fabulous colour on this Connoisseurs Choice Caperdonich 1972 from Gordon & Macphail, thanks to maturation in first-fill sherry casks. This will fly off the shelves. 70cl £ 172.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenfiddich Malt Master's Edition / Sherry Cask Finish Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 43%

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Distillery Bottling – Glenfiddich's Malt Master, Brian Kinsman, is the first to double mature a Glenfiddich whisky in two different casks (although shorter finishing periods in more than one kind of casks has of course been done several times before). This whisky has been matured for some time in traditional Oak casks before finishing its maturation in Sherry casks. 70cl £ 48.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Old St Andrews Clubhouse Blended Whisky Miniature Blended Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 5cl / 40% – A blended whisky cunningly contained within a clear glass golfball. Perfect for those who like to ruin a good walk. 5cl £ 2.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glen Garioch 1995 Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: Strength: 55.3%

Vintage: 1995 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 55.3% / Distillery Bottling – A 1995 vintage whisky from Glen Garioch. Although no age is stated, this has been bottled in 2012 which makes it roughly 17 years old. 70cl £ 49.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Yamazaki 1995 / Owner's Cask / Sherry Cask Japanese Single Malt Whisky

Country: Japanese Region: Japanese

Age: Strength: 54.9%

Vintage: 1995 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 54.9% / Distillery Bottling – A special bottling of 1995 Yamazaki for La Maison du Whisky. Matured for 15 years in a sherry cask and bottled at cask strength. MAX 1 BOTTLE PER CUSTOMER 70cl £ 250.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Yellow Spot 12 Year Old Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey

Country: Irish Region: Irish

Age: 12 Year Old Strength: 46%

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – A second entry into the 'Spot' range, aged for 12 years and made up in part from spirit matured in malaga casks for a sweet and moreish dram. 70cl £ 60.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Johnnie Walker Oldest (unboxed) Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 43%

Summary: 75cl / 43% – Oldest is a very early version of Johnnie Walker's Blue Label that is becoming increasingly rare and hard to find. This bottle is supplied without its box. 75cl £ 599.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Cragganmore 1997 / 14 Year Old / Cask #1126+1127 Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 14 Year Old Strength: 46%

Vintage: 1997 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Signatory – Thsi whisky is a marriage of two casks from Cragganmore distillery. This 1997 whisky has been matured in oak hogsheads and aged for a minimum of 14 years. Bottled in 2012, without chillfiltration. 70cl £ 37.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Dimple / Bot.1970s / Plastic Cap Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1970 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 43% – An old bottling of Dimple Haig blended whisky. This was most likely bottled in the 1970s. 75cl £ 69.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Arran 1998 / Bourbon Cask #707 Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: Strength: 57.1%

Vintage: 1998 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 57.1% / Distillery Bottling – A single cask release of bourbon cask matured Arran whisky. This whisky has been aged for atleast 12 years and bottled at cask strength in July 2010. 70cl £ 46.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Arran 1998 / Sherry Cask #513 Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: Strength: 56.4%

Vintage: 1998 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 56.4% / Distillery Bottling – A single cask release of Arran whisky, distilled on 20th April 1998 and bottled in 2010. This whisky has been matured in a sherry cask bottled at cask strength. 70cl £ 46.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Té Bheag / Old Presentation / Screw Cap Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – An old presentation of Té Bheag blended whisky (pronounced "chey vek"). This was produced in the mid 00s, and is sealed with a screw cap rather than the current presentation which uses a cork stopper. 70cl £ 23.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Johnnie Walker Blue Label Elite Glass Pack Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% – A special gift pack of Johnnie Walker Blue Label, the Elite edition comes with two tumblers and is packaged in a solid lacquered box. 70cl £ 199.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Elijah Craig 20 Year Old Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey

Country: American Region: American

Age: 20 Year Old Strength: 45%

Summary: 75cl / 45% – A very special bottle of Elijah Craig 20 year old Kentucky straight bourbon. This whiskey was drawn from the same lot as Whisky Advocate's American whiskey of the year (2011). 75cl £ 124.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Peter Dawson Special Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 37.5cl / 40% 37cl £ 9.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Select Miniature Tennessee Whiskey

Country: American Region: American

Age: Strength: 45%

Summary: 5cl / 45% – A miniature bottles of JD's Single Barrel Select whiskey, matured in the highest ricks of their warhouses where the temperature fluctuates the most to give it a more robust and complex flavour. 5cl £ 5.75 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Lochside 1965 / Single Blend / Adelphi Highland Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: Strength: 54.6%

Vintage: 1965 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 54.6% / Adelphi – Another 'single blend' from Adelphi, a single cask bottling of Lochside that is made up of both grain and malt whisky from 1965, distilled at the distillery and filled into the cask together. A big hit at The Whisky Show 2012. 70cl £ 260.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky Japanese Grain Whisky

Country: Japanese Region: Japanese

Age: Strength: 45%

Summary: 50cl / 45% – A release of grain whisky from Japan's Nikka, produced mainly from corn using one of their continuous Coffey stills. Rather than the rare and limited releases they have done before, this is a larger release to further show off this key component in the Nikka family of whiskies. 50cl £ 38.49 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

North Port Brechin 1981 / Connoisseurs Choice / Bot.1998 Highland Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: Strength: 40%

Vintage: 1998 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 40% / Gordon & Macphail – A 1981 vintage release of North Port Brechin. This whisky was bottles in 1998 making it atleast 16 years old. 70cl £ 199.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenturret 1976 Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: Strength: 58.7%

Vintage: 1976 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 58.7% / Distillery Bottling – A 1976 vintage distillery bottling of Glenturret, bottled in 1986 at a punchy 58.6%, 102.7 proof. 75cl £ 499.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Longmorn 1973 / Sherry Cask / Gordon & Macphail Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1973 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Gordon & Macphail – A 1973 vintage whisky from Longmorn Distillery. Matured in sherry casks and bottled by Gordon & Macphail in 2012, making this whisky approximately 39 years old. 70cl £ 169.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Bowmore 1985 / 26 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 26 Year Old Strength: 52.3%

Vintage: 1985 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 52.3% / Distillery Bottling – A limited edition of just 747 bottles from Bowmore, distilled in 1985 and bottled in 2012. A classic mid-80s expression with fruit, chocolate and smoke running through the palate. 70cl £ 450.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Caperdonich 1998 / Bot.2011 Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 46%

Vintage: 2011 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Gordon & Macphail – A 1998 vintage whisky from closed Caperdonich, mothballed since 2002. This has been bottled by Gordon & Macphail for their Connoisseurs Choice range. 70cl £ 41.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenfiddich 40 Year Old / Release No.9 / Bot.2012 Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 40 Year Old Strength: 41.7%

Summary: 70cl / 41.7% / Distillery Bottling – The 9th release of Glenfiddich's series of incredible 40 year old whiskies, bottled in 2012. Vatted from a selection of excellent casks as well as the saved remnants of previous year's vattings. 70cl £ 2,750.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Bruichladdich 1979 / 17 Year Old / Cask #848+9 Islay Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 17 Year Old Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1979 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Signatory – A 1979 vintage whisky distilled at Bruichladdich distillery on Islay. This is a marriage of two casks which have been aged for atleast 17 years. 70cl £ 125.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenlivet 1966 / Bot.2012 / Gordon & Macphail Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1966 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Gordon & Macphail – A 1966 Glenlivet bottled by Gordon & Macphail with the now traditional retro "Smith's" label. 70cl £ 215.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Port Charlotte / The Peat Project Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: Strength: 46%

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – A statement of intent from Bruichladdich master distiller Jim McEwan, showing his vivions for Port Charlotte spirit – peated to 44ppm and vatted from various vintages. 70cl £ 32.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Bruichladdich Laddie 16 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 16 Year Old Strength: 46%

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – The middle entry in Bruichladdich's revitalised line-up, sitting between the 10 and 22 to provide a bourbon cask focused slice of unpeated Islay whisky. 70cl £ 52.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Bruichladdich Laddie 22 Year Old Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 22 Year Old Strength: 46%

Summary: 70cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – A combination of classic and new Bruichladdich, at release the oldest in the distillery's revitalised range of unpeated Islay whiskies. 70cl £ 83.25 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Macallan 1996 / 16 Year Old / Old Malt Cask #8815 Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 16 Year Old Strength: 50%

Vintage: 1996 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 50% / Douglas Laing – A 1996 vintage whisky from Macallan, bottled in July 2012 by Douglas Laing for their Old Malt Cask range after 16 years of maturation in a refill butt. 70cl £ 70.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Macallan 1991 / 21 Year Old / Directors' Cut Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 21 Year Old Strength: 52.7%

Vintage: 1991 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 52.7% / Douglas Laing – A 21 year old whisky from Macallan, distilled in March 1991, matured in a refill hogshead and bottled in July 2012 by Douglas Laing for their Directors' Cut range. 70cl £ 132.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Springbank 1996 / 15 Year Old / Directors' Cut Campbeltown Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Campbeltown

Age: 15 Year Old Strength: 56.3%

Vintage: 1996 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 56.3% / Douglas Laing – A 1996 vintage Springbank, richly coloured after 15 years of maturation in a sherry butt before bottling in 2012 by Douglas Laing as part of their Directors' Cut series. 70cl £ 124.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Port Charlotte / The Peat Project / Small Bottle Islay Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: Strength: 46%

Summary: 20cl / 46% / Distillery Bottling – A small bottle of Bruichladdich's Peat Project edition of their peated Port Charlotte spirit. A multi-vintage vatting showcasing head distiller Jim McEwan's plans for the whisky. 20cl £ 12.49 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Octomore 5 Year Old / Edition 05.1 / 169ppm Islay Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Islay

Age: 5 Year Old Strength: 59.5%

Summary: 70cl / 59.5% / Distillery Bottling – The late 2012 release under Bruichladdich's Octomore label, peated to a fairly astounding 169ppm. Expect fire from the cask strength and lots of smoke, but also some elegance hiding behind the fireworks. 70cl £ 89.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Talisker 10 Year Old / 2 Glass Pack Island Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Island

Age: 10 Year Old Strength: 45.8%

Summary: 70cl / 45.8% / Distillery Bottling – Talisker's excellent ten year old maritime malt, packaged with a pair of their round bottom 'rocking' tumblers – perfect for reenacting ship-board drinking or just for simply sharing a dram or two. 70cl £ 36.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Singleton Of Dufftown 12 Year Old / 2 Glass Pack Speyside Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: 12 Year Old Strength: 40%

Summary: 70cl / 40% / Distillery Bottling – Dufftown's 12 year old whisky, the cornerstone of the Diageo single malt range in Europe, presented here in a pack along with two chunkky based tumblers. 70cl £ 32.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Black & White Blended Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 43%

Summary: 100cl / 43% 100cl £ 29.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Bulloch Lade Gold Label Blended Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 40%

Summary: 37.5cl / 40% 37cl £ 12.95 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Johnnie Walker Blue Label / Gerald Scarfe 2009 Blended Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 2009 Bottler:

Summary: 100cl / 43% – A limited edition release of Johnnie Walker Blue Label. The Gerald Scarfe edition was launched in Singapore in 2009 and was available through travel retail. In a collaboration with world reknowned artist Gerald Scarfe, the iconic striding man has been redesigned and engraved onto the bottle itself. 100cl £ 299.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Glenlivet 1943 / Gordon & Macphail Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Speyside

Age: Strength: 40%

Vintage: 1943 Bottler:

Summary: 75cl / 40% / Gordon & Macphail – Wartime Distillation 75cl £ 1,305.39 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Wasmund's Barrel Kit / Single Malt

Country: Scotland Region:

Age: Strength: 62%

Summary: 140cl / 62% – A great idea from the folks at Wasmund's – a 2 litre new charred oak cask, two 70cl bottles of their single malt spirit and the challenge of maturing your own 'whisky'. It'll pick up flavour quickly in a barrel this small so it's perfect for experimentation. 140cl £ 120.00 BUY NOW The Whisky Exchange

Oban 1997 / Distillers Edition Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky

Country: Scotland Region: Highland

Age: Strength: 43%

Vintage: 1997 Bottler:

Summary: 70cl / 43% / Distillery Bottling – The 1997 vintage edition of Oban's Distillers Edition, finished in Montiall casks some extra sweetness and complexity. 70cl £ 55.95 BUY NOW
